patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: Dayananda Sagar College of Engineering  does  provide hostel facility for both Boys And Girls. It has NRI hostel as well for Boys.

patterns: does the college have library facility
responses: College has a well developed Library as well as Digital Library for students located near the main gate. For more information you can visit College Website <a target="_blank"href="https://www.dsce.edu.in/library/" > here < /a>

patterns: Is there a cafetaria in college
responses: DSCE has canteen facility with  wide variety of dishes available. It has recently started FOOD TRUCK for students.

patterns: what is the name of principal
responses: Dr. C.P.S. Prakash is principal of the College.Principal's office is located at ground floor of Heritage Block.
Here is the Academic Calendar website

DSCE provides fully infrastructured  Labs with internet connection, Smart Classrooms, Auditorium, Amphitheatre, Library,Canteen, Hostel,Playgrounds,Parking Facilities and many other facilities for mental and social growth of students.

patterns: what is the process of admission

responses: College intakes students based on three categories CET , COMED-K and Management qouta. For more information visit the college website .

patterns: what is the nearest metro station
responses: Banashankari Metro Station and JP Nagar Metro station are nearest to the college.

patterns: how long will be the vacation
responses: Vacation is provided after every semester.More days are given after the end of Even semester than Odd Semester.

patterns: how long will be the fastrack
responses: Fasttrack is usually held after every even semester for students having backlog in that academic year for 1-2 months.
